attributes.action: goverment direct support to the Ebola deadly diesea in west africa especialy sierra leone
attributes.additional_details: As a commonwealth member state, it obvIous that Sierra Leone lack proper health care system to deal with such outbreak. The commonwealth office and Ministry of Health should have a direct impact to help get rid of alarming death rate. The expertise and provision of healthcare materials will go a long way to help stamp out  Ebola. UK goverment help stop the rebel war just in time and the Ebola outbreak is proving just like a war on the people of Sierra Leone. USA is helping Liberia on a personal level, why is UK not doing the same as a colonial master and commonwealth head.
